description:
Tsukai Saraka is the International Negotiator for the Ministry acting on behalf of the Japanese government delegation. Whilst not against the anisotropic itself, she disapproves of the devices http://anidb.net/ch87269 [Yaha-kui Zashunina] introduces as they impact "humanity`s dignity" and urged http://anidb.net/ch87281 [Shindou] to reassess Yaha-kui Zashunina`s purpose.
She is later revealed to be an anisotropic being herself and the administrator of the universe humanity resides within.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Tsukai Saraka
